hexcastingadditions.tostring: This will convert the iota at the top into a string. If the iota is a player will return the player name; if the iota is an item will return the item type
hexcastingadditions.readstring: Read text from your offhand if its a book; otherwise reads the name of the item.
hexcastingadditions.substring: Will get a segment of the string
hexcastingadditions.concatstring: Takes two strings and puts them togethers. "a" + "b" -> "ab"
hexcastingadditions.stringtodouble: Converts a string into a double
hexcastingadditions.stringlen: returns the amount of characters in a string
hexcastingadditions.tocodepoint: gets a number that references the character
hexcastingadditions.fromcodepoint: gets the character with number reference
hexcastingadditions.isstringdouble: checks that the string given is a number
hexcastingadditions.stringsegment: splits the string by the other string, and returns a list of all the segments. If the second string is empty it gets a list of letters
hexcastingadditions.patternstring: takes in a pattern and a direction and returns a pattern. valid letters are: a,q,w,e,d
hexcastingadditions.patternstring.2: And directions are:$(br)0 -> WEST,$(br)1 -> NORTH_WEST,$(br)2 -> NORTH_EAST,$(br)3 -> EAST,$(br)4 -> SOUTH_EAST,$(br)5 -> SOUTH_WEST
hexcastingadditions.indexof: Gets the index of the string and returns null if its not contained
hexcastingadditions.charat: returns the character from the index given
hexcastingadditions.handitemiota: returns the item in your hand as an iota
hexcastingadditions.armoritemiota: returns an armor slot as an iota
hexcastingadditions.blockentityitem: returns the item from the given block and slot
hexcastingadditions.grabitem: gets the item and puts it in your inventory consumes 1 dust every 100 blocks
hexcastingadditions.swapitem: swaps the items consumes 1 dust every 100 blocks
hexcastingadditions.changedelay: changes the delay on Veil's Accessory
hexcastingadditions.asynch: runs a spell after the given delay; however any spells that come after it will not wait and will be ran at the same time
hexcastingadditions.chat: everyone will see the given value in chat
hexcasting.mishap.unparsablenumber: attempted to parse %s as a number
hexcasting.mishap.unexpecteditemreferenc: attempted to use %s which is a non-real item reference
hexcastingadditions.veiltrinket.page.1: This has not been finished being implemented
hexcastingadditions.veiltrinket.page.2: The idea is for the accessory to run the pattern with the given delay while in a player inventory
